626 {
627  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_neutral,
628  _( "You take some antibiotics." ),
629  _( "<npcname> takes some antibiotics." ) );
630  if( p->has_effect( effect_tetanus ) ) {
631  if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
632  p->remove_effect( effect_tetanus );
633  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The muscle spasms start to go away." ) );
634  } else {
635  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "The medication does nothing to help the spasms." ) );
636  }
637  }
638  if( p->has_effect( effect_infected ) && !p->has_effect( effect_antibiotic ) ) {
639  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
640  _( "Maybe this is just the placebo effect, but you feel a little better as the dose settles in." ) );
641  }
642  p->add_effect( effect_antibiotic, 12_hours );
643  p->add_effect( effect_antibiotic_visible, rng( 9_hours, 15_hours ) );
644  return 1;
645 }

Strength reduces duration of anticonvulsant medication

790 {
791  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You take some anticonvulsant medication." ) );
792  /** @EFFECT_STR reduces duration of anticonvulsant medication */
793  time_duration duration = 8_hours - p->str_cur * rng( 0_turns, 10_minutes );
794  if( p->has_trait( trait_TOLERANCE ) ) {
795  duration -= 1_hours;
796  }
797  if( p->has_trait( trait_LIGHTWEIGHT ) ) {
798  duration += 2_hours;
799  }
800  p->add_effect( effect_valium, duration );
801  p->add_effect( effect_took_anticonvulsant_visible, duration );
802  p->add_effect( effect_high, duration );
803  if( p->has_effect( effect_shakes ) ) {
804  p->remove_effect( effect_shakes );
805  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You stop shaking." ) );
806  }
807  return 1;
808 }

8784  const auto enough_writing_tool_charges = [&writing_tools]( int pages ) {
8785  for( const item *it : writing_tools ) {
8786  if( it->ammo_required() == 0 ) {
8787  return true;
8788  }
8789  pages -= it->ammo_remaining() / it->ammo_required();
8790  if( pages <= 0 ) {
8791  return true;
8792  }
8793  }
8794  return false;

8805 
8806  if( !p->has_charges( itype_paper, pages ) ) {
8807  desc = _( "You do not have enough paper to copy this recipe." );
8808  } else if( binder->remaining_ammo_capacity() < pages ) {
8809  desc = _( "Your recipe book can not fit this recipe." );
8810  } else if( binder->get_saved_recipes().count( r->ident() ) != 0 ) {
8811  desc = string_format( _( "Your recipe book already has a recipe for %s." ), r->result_name() );
8812  } else if( !enough_writing_tool_charges( pages ) ) {
8813  desc = _( "Your writing tools do not have enough charges." );
8814  }
8815  menu.addentry_col( -1, desc.empty(), std::nullopt, r->result_name(), pages_str, desc );
8816  }
8817  if( menu.entries.empty() ) {
8818  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have any recipes you can copy." ) );
8819  return std::nullopt;
8820  }
8821  menu.query();

8823  return std::nullopt;
8824  }

8827  p->assign_activity( act );
8828 
8829  return std::nullopt;
8830 }

1056  // TODO: Add more effects?
1057  if( it->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
1058  if( !p->query_yn( _( "This looks unhealthy, sure you want to drink it?" ) ) ) {
1059  return std::nullopt;
1060  }

1070  //reverse the harmful values of drinking this acid.
1071  double multiplier = -1;

4390 {
4391  if( p->is_npc() ) {
4392  return std::nullopt; // No NPCs for now!

4395  return std::nullopt;
4396  }

4399  return std::nullopt;
4400  }
4401 
4402  item blood( "blood", calendar::turn );
4403  bool drew_blood = false;
4404  bool acid_blood = false;
4405  bool vampire = false;
4406  units::temperature blood_temp = units::from_kelvin( -1.0f ); //kelvins
4407  for( item &map_it : get_map().i_at( point( p->posx(), p->posy() ) ) ) {
4408  if( map_it.is_corpse() &&
4409  query_yn( _( "Draw blood from %s?" ),
4410  colorize( map_it.tname(), map_it.color_in_inventory() ) ) ) {
4411  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You drew blood from the %s…" ), map_it.tname() );
4412  drew_blood = true;
4413  blood_temp = map_it.temperature;
4414 
4415  field_type_id bloodtype( map_it.get_mtype()->bloodType() );
4416  if( bloodtype.obj().has_acid ) {
4417  acid_blood = true;
4418  } else {
4419  blood.set_mtype( map_it.get_mtype() );
4420 
4421  for( const harvest_entry &entry : map_it.get_mtype()->harvest.obj() ) {
4422  if( entry.type == harvest_drop_blood ) {
4423  blood.convert( itype_id( entry.drop ) );
4424  break;
4425  }
4426  }
4427  }
4428  }
4429  }
4430 
4431  if( !drew_blood && query_yn( _( "Draw your own blood?" ) ) ) {
4432  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You drew your own blood…" ) );
4433  drew_blood = true;
4434  blood_temp = units::from_celsius( 37 );
4435  if( p->has_trait( trait_ACIDBLOOD ) ) {
4436  acid_blood = true;
4437  }
4438  if( p->has_trait( trait_VAMPIRE ) ) {
4439  vampire = true;
4440  }
4441  // From wikipedia,
4442  // "To compare, this (volume of blood loss that causes death) is five to eight times
4443  // as much blood as people usually give in a blood donation.[2]"
4444  // This is half a TU, hence I'm setting it to 1/10th of a lethal exsanguination.
4445  p->vitamin_mod( vitamin_redcells, vitamin_redcells->min() / 10 );
4446  p->vitamin_mod( vitamin_blood, vitamin_blood->min() / 10 );
4447  p->mod_pain( 3 );
4448  }
4449 
4450  if( acid_blood ) {
4451  item acid( "blood_acid", calendar::turn );
4452  acid.set_item_temperature( blood_temp );
4453  it->put_in( acid, pocket_type::CONTAINER );
4454  if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
4455  if( it->inc_damage() ) {
4456  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "…but acidic blood melts the %s, destroying it!" ),
4457  it->tname() );
4458  p->i_rem( it );
4459  return 0;
4460  }
4461  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "…but acidic blood damages the %s!" ), it->tname() );
4462  }
4463  }
4464 
4465  if( vampire ) {
4466  p->vitamin_mod( vitamin_human_blood_vitamin, -500 );
4467  }
4468 
4469  if( !drew_blood ) {
4470  return std::nullopt;;
4471  }
4472 
4473  blood.set_item_temperature( blood_temp );
4474  it->put_in( blood, pocket_type::CONTAINER );
4475  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
4476  return 1;
4477 }

4734  [&here, p]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
4735  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
4736  return false;
4737  } else if( here.has_furn( pnt ) ) {

6519  enum {c_shot, c_photos, c_monsters, c_upload};

6521  // From item processing
6522  if( !p ) {
6523  debugmsg( "%s called action camera that requires character but no character is present",

6525  return std::nullopt;
6526  }
6527 
6528  // CAMERA_NPC_PHOTOS is old save variable
6529  bool found_extended_photos = !it->get_var( "CAMERA_NPC_PHOTOS" ).empty() ||
6530  !it->get_var( "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" ).empty();
6531  bool found_monster_photos = !it->get_var( "CAMERA_MONSTER_PHOTOS" ).empty();
6532 
6533  uilist amenu;
6534  amenu.text = _( "What to do with camera?" );
6535  amenu.addentry( c_shot, true, 't', _( "Take a photo" ) );
6536  if( !found_extended_photos && !found_monster_photos ) {
6537  amenu.addentry( c_photos, false, 'l', _( "No photos in memory" ) );
6538  } else {
6539  if( found_extended_photos ) {
6540  amenu.addentry( c_photos, true, 'l', _( "List photos" ) );
6541  }
6542  if( found_monster_photos ) {
6543  amenu.addentry( c_monsters, true, 'm', _( "Your collection of monsters" ) );
6544  }
6545  amenu.addentry( c_upload, true, 'u', _( "Upload photos to memory card" ) );
6546  }
6547 
6548  amenu.query();
6549  const int choice = amenu.ret;
6550 
6551  if( choice < 0 ) {
6552  return std::nullopt;
6553  }
6554 
6555  map &here = get_map();
6556  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
6557  if( c_shot == choice ) {
6558  const std::optional<tripoint> aim_point_ = g->look_around();
6559 
6560  if( !aim_point_ ) {
6561  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
6562  return std::nullopt;
6563  }
6564  tripoint aim_point = *aim_point_;
6565  bool incorrect_focus = false;
6566  tripoint_range<tripoint> aim_bounds = here.points_in_radius( aim_point, 2 );
6567 
6568  std::vector<tripoint> trajectory = line_to( p->pos(), aim_point, 0, 0 );
6569  trajectory.push_back( aim_point );
6570 
6571  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * 0.5 );
6572  sounds::sound( p->pos(), 8, sounds::sound_t::activity, _( "Click." ), true, "tool",
6573  "camera_shutter" );
6574 
6575  for( std::vector<tripoint>::iterator point_it = trajectory.begin();
6576  point_it != trajectory.end();
6577  ++point_it ) {
6578  const tripoint trajectory_point = *point_it;
6579  if( point_it != trajectory.end() ) {
6580  const tripoint next_point = *( point_it + 1 ); // Trajectory ends on last visible tile
6581  if( !here.sees( p->pos(), next_point, rl_dist( p->pos(), next_point ) + 3 ) ) {
6582  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You have the wrong camera focus." ) );
6583  incorrect_focus = true;
6584  // recalculate target point
6585  aim_point = trajectory_point;
6586  aim_bounds = here.points_in_radius( trajectory_point, 2 );
6587  }
6588  }
6589

6591  Character *const guy = creatures.creature_at<Character>( trajectory_point );
6592  if( mon || guy || trajectory_point == aim_point ) {
6593  int dist = rl_dist( p->pos(), trajectory_point );
6594 
6595  int camera_bonus = it->has_flag( flag_CAMERA_PRO ) ? 10 : 0;
6596  int photo_quality = 20 - rng( dist, dist * 2 ) * 2 + rng( camera_bonus / 2, camera_bonus );
6597  if( photo_quality > 5 ) {
6598  photo_quality = 5;
6599  }
6600  if( photo_quality < 0 ) {
6601  photo_quality = 0;
6602  }
6603  if( p->is_blind() ) {
6604  photo_quality /= 2;
6605  }
6606 
6607  if( mon ) {
6608  monster &z = *mon;
6609 
6610  // shoot past small monsters and hallucinations
6611  if( trajectory_point != aim_point && ( z.type->size <= creature_size::small ||
6612  z.is_hallucination() ||
6613  z.type->in_species( species_HALLUCINATION ) ) ) {
6614  continue;
6615  }
6616  if( !aim_bounds.is_point_inside( trajectory_point ) ) {
6617  // take a photo of the monster that's in the way
6618  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "A %s got in the way of your photo." ), z.name() );
6619  incorrect_focus = true;
6620  } else if( trajectory_point != aim_point ) { // shoot past mon that will be in photo anyway
6621  continue;
6622  }
6623  // get a special message if the target is a hallucination
6624  if( trajectory_point == aim_point && ( z.is_hallucination() ||
6625  z.type->in_species( species_HALLUCINATION ) ) ) {
6626  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Strange… there's nothing in the center of this picture?" ) );
6627  }
6628  } else if( guy ) {
6629  if( trajectory_point == aim_point && guy->is_hallucination() ) {
6630  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Strange… %s isn't visible on the picture?" ), guy->get_name() );
6631  } else if( !aim_bounds.is_point_inside( trajectory_point ) ) {
6632  // take a photo of the monster that's in the way
6633  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "%s got in the way of your photo." ), guy->get_name() );
6634  incorrect_focus = true;
6635  } else if( trajectory_point != aim_point ) { // shoot past guy that will be in photo anyway
6636  continue;
6637  }
6638  }
6639  if( incorrect_focus ) {
6640  photo_quality = photo_quality == 0 ? 0 : photo_quality - 1;
6641  }
6642 
6643  std::vector<item::extended_photo_def> extended_photos;
6644  std::vector<monster *> monster_vec;
6645  std::vector<Character *> character_vec;
6646  item::extended_photo_def photo = photo_def_for_camera_point( trajectory_point, p->pos(),
6647  monster_vec, character_vec );
6648  photo.quality = photo_quality;
6649 
6650  try {
6651  it->read_extended_photos( extended_photos, "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS", false );
6652  extended_photos.push_back( photo );
6653  it->write_extended_photos( extended_photos, "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" );
6654  } catch( const JsonError &e ) {
6655  debugmsg( "Error when adding new photo (loaded photos = %i): %s", extended_photos.size(),
6656  e.c_str() );
6657  }
6658 
6659  const bool selfie = std::find( character_vec.begin(), character_vec.end(),
6660  p ) != character_vec.end();
6661 
6662  if( selfie ) {
6663  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You took a selfie." ) );
6664  } else {
6665  if( p->is_blind() ) {
6666  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You took a photo of %s." ), photo.name );
6667  } else {
6668  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You took a photo of %1$s. It is %2$s." ), photo.name,
6669  photo_quality_name( photo_quality ) );
6670  }
6671  std::vector<std::string> blinded_names;
6672  for( monster * const &monster_p : monster_vec ) {
6673  if( dist < 4 && one_in( dist + 2 ) && monster_p->has_flag( mon_flag_SEES ) ) {
6674  monster_p->add_effect( effect_blind, rng( 5_turns, 10_turns ) );
6675  blinded_names.push_back( monster_p->name() );
6676  }
6677  }
6678  for( Character * const &character_p : character_vec ) {
6679  if( dist < 4 && one_in( dist + 2 ) && !character_p->is_blind() ) {
6680  character_p->add_effect( effect_blind, rng( 5_turns, 10_turns ) );
6681  blinded_names.push_back( character_p->get_name() );
6682  }
6683  }
6684  if( !blinded_names.empty() ) {
6685  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "%s looks blinded." ), enumerate_as_string( blinded_names.begin(),
6686  blinded_names.end(), []( const std::string & it ) {
6687  return colorize( it, c_light_blue );
6688  } ) );
6689  }
6690  }
6691  if( !monster_vec.empty() ) {
6692  item_save_monsters( *p, *it, monster_vec, photo_quality );
6693  }
6694  return 1;
6695  }
6696  }
6697  return 1;
6698  }
6699 
6700  if( c_photos == choice ) {
6701  show_photo_selection( *p, *it, "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" );
6702  return 1;
6703  }
6704 
6705  if( c_monsters == choice ) {
6706  if( p->is_blind() ) {
6707  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't see the camera screen, you're blind." ) );
6708  return 0;
6709  }
6710  uilist pmenu;
6711 
6712  pmenu.text = _( "Your collection of monsters:" );
6713 
6714  std::vector<mtype_id> monster_photos;
6715  std::vector<std::string> descriptions;
6716 
6717  std::istringstream f_mon( it->get_var( "CAMERA_MONSTER_PHOTOS" ) );
6718  std::string s;
6719  int k = 0;
6720  while( getline( f_mon, s, ',' ) ) {
6721 
6722  if( s.empty() ) {
6723  continue;
6724  }
6725 
6726  monster_photos.emplace_back( s );
6727 
6728  std::string menu_str;
6729 
6730  const monster dummy( monster_photos.back() );
6731  menu_str = dummy.name();
6732  descriptions.push_back( dummy.type->get_description() );
6733 
6734  getline( f_mon, s, ',' );
6735  const int quality = get_quality_from_string( s );
6736 
6737  menu_str += " [" + photo_quality_name( quality ) + "]";
6738 
6739  pmenu.addentry( k++, true, -1, menu_str.c_str() );
6740  }
6741 
6742  int choice;
6743  do {
6744  pmenu.query();
6745  choice = pmenu.ret;
6746 
6747  if( choice < 0 ) {
6748  break;
6749  }
6750 
6751  popup( "%s", descriptions[choice].c_str() );
6752 
6753  } while( true );
6754 
6755  return 1;
6756  }
6757 
6758  if( c_upload == choice ) {
6759 
6760  if( p->is_blind() ) {
6761  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't see the camera screen, you're blind." ) );
6762  return std::nullopt;
6763  }
6764 
6765  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
6766 
6767  avatar *you = p->as_avatar();
6768  item_location loc;
6769  if( you != nullptr ) {
6770  loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( []( const item & it ) {
6771  return it.has_flag( flag_MC_MOBILE );
6772  }, *you, _( "Insert memory card" ) );
6773  }
6774  if( !loc ) {
6775  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have that item!" ) );
6776  return 1;
6777  }
6778  item &mc = *loc;
6779 
6780  if( mc.has_flag( flag_MC_HAS_DATA ) ) {
6781  if( !query_yn( _( "Are you sure you want to clear the old data on the card?" ) ) ) {
6782  return 1;
6783  }
6784  }
6785 
6786  mc.convert( itype_memory_card );
6787  mc.clear_vars();
6788  mc.unset_flags();
6789  mc.set_flag( flag_MC_HAS_DATA );
6790 
6791  mc.set_var( "MC_MONSTER_PHOTOS", it->get_var( "CAMERA_MONSTER_PHOTOS" ) );
6792  mc.set_var( "MC_EXTENDED_PHOTOS", it->get_var( "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" ) );
6793  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
6794  _( "You upload your photos and monster collection to the memory card." ) );
6795 
6796  return 1;
6797  }
6798 
6799  return 1;
6800 }

8057  const monster &f = *mon_ptr;
8058 
8059  if( f.get_size() > Creature::size_map.find( capacity )->second ) {
8060  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %1$s is too big to put in your %2$s." ),
8061  f.type->nname(), it->tname() );
8062  return std::nullopt;
8063  }
8064  // TODO: replace this with some kind of melee check.
8065  int chance = f.hp_percentage() / 10;
8066  // A weaker monster is easier to capture.
8067  // If the monster is friendly, then put it in the item
8068  // without checking if it rolled a success.
8069  if( f.friendly != 0 || one_in( chance ) ) {
8070  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You capture the %1$s in your %2$s." ),
8071  f.type->nname(), it->tname() );
8072  return it->contain_monster( target );
8073  } else {
8074  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The %1$s avoids your attempts to put it in the %2$s." ),
8075  f.type->nname(), it->type->nname( 1 ) );
8076  }
8077  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
8078  } else {
8079  add_msg( _( "The %s can't capture nothing" ), it->tname() );
8080  return std::nullopt;
8081  }
8082  }
8083  return 0;
8084 }

bool is_mounted() const

◆ crowbar()

std::optional< int > iuse::crowbar ( Character *  p,
item *  it,
const tripoint &  pos 
)

Definition at line 2719 of file iuse.cpp.

2720 {
2721  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
2722  return std::nullopt;
2723  }
2724 
2725  map &here = get_map();
2726  const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f =
2727  [&here, p]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
2728  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
2729  return false;
2730  } else if( here.has_furn( pnt ) ) {
2731  return here.furn( pnt )->prying->valid();
2732  } else if( !here.ter( pnt )->is_null() ) {
2733  return here.ter( pnt )->prying->valid();
2734  }
2735  return false;
2736  };
2737 
2738  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = ( pos != p->pos() ) ? pos : choose_adjacent_highlight(
2739  _( "Pry where?" ), _( "There is nothing to pry nearby." ), f, false );
2740  if( !pnt_ ) {
2741  return std::nullopt;
2742  }
2743 
2744  const tripoint &pnt = *pnt_;
2745 
2746  const pry_data *prying;
2747  if( here.has_furn( pnt ) ) {
2748  prying = &here.furn( pnt )->prying->prying_data();
2749  } else {
2750  prying = &here.ter( pnt )->prying->prying_data();
2751  }
2752 
2753  if( !f( pnt ) ) {
2754  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
2755  if( it->typeId() == STATIC( itype_id( "hammer" ) ) ) {
2756  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You try to hit yourself with the hammer." ) );
2757  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "But you can't touch this." ) );
2758  } else {
2759  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You attempt to pry open your wallet, "
2760  "but alas. You are just too miserly." ) );
2761  }
2762  } else {
2763  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't pry that." ) );
2764  }
2765  return std::nullopt;
2766  }
2767 
2768  // previously iuse::hammer
2769  if( prying->prying_nails ) {
2770  p->assign_activity( prying_activity_actor( pnt, item_location{*p, it} ) );
2771  return std::nullopt;
2772  }
2773 
2774  // Doors need PRY 2 which is on a crowbar, crates need PRY 1 which is on a crowbar
2775  // & a claw hammer.
2776  // The iexamine function for crate supplies a hammer object.
2777  // So this stops the player (A)ctivating a Hammer with a Crowbar in their backpack
2778  // then managing to open a door.
2779  const int pry_level = it->get_quality( qual_PRY );
2780 
2781  if( pry_level < prying->prying_level ) {
2782  // This doesn't really make it clear to the player
2783  // why their attempt is failing.
2784  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't get sufficient leverage to open that with your %1$s." ),
2785  it->tname() );
2786  p->mod_moves( -50 ); // spend a few moves trying it.
2787  return std::nullopt;
2788  }
2789 
2790  p->assign_activity( prying_activity_actor( pnt, item_location{*p, it} ) );
2791 
2792  return std::nullopt;
2793 }

4329  return !who.is_deaf() && p->sees( who ) &&
4330  who.has_trait( STATIC( trait_id( "THRESH_LUPINE" ) ) );

4354  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, your_message.value().translated() );
4355  }
4356  }

4371  }

8581 
8582  // list of books of from_it that are not in to_it
8583  auto book_difference = []( const item & from_it, const item & to_it ) -> std::vector<const item *> {
8584  std::set<itype_id> existing_ebooks;
8585  for( const item *ebook : to_it.ebooks() )
8586  {
8587  if( !ebook->is_book() ) {
8588  debugmsg( "ebook type pocket contains non-book item %s", ebook->typeId().str() );
8589  continue;
8590  }
8591 
8592  existing_ebooks.insert( ebook->typeId() );
8593  }
8594 
8595  std::vector<const item *> ebooks;
8596  for( const item *ebook : from_it.ebooks() )
8597  {
8598  if( !ebook->is_book() ) {
8599  debugmsg( "ebook type pocket contains non-book item %s", ebook->typeId().str() );
8600  continue;
8601  }
8602 
8603  if( existing_ebooks.count( ebook->typeId() ) ) {
8604  continue;
8605  }
8606 
8607  ebooks.emplace_back( ebook );
8608  }
8609  return ebooks;
8610  };
8611 
8612  std::vector<const item *> to_storage = book_difference( *it, *storage_card );
8613  std::vector<const item *> to_device = book_difference( *storage_card, *it );
8614 
8615  uilist smenu;
8616  smenu.text = _( "What to do with your storage devices:" );
8617 
8618  smenu.addentry( 1, !to_device.empty(), 't', _( "Copy to device from the card" ) );
8619  smenu.addentry( 2, !to_storage.empty(), 'f', _( "Copy from device to the card" ) );
8620  smenu.addentry( 3, !storage_card->ebooks().empty(), 'v', _( "View books in the card" ) );
8621  smenu.query();
8622 
8623  // were any books moved to or from the device
8624  int books_moved = 0;
8625 
8626  auto move_books = [&books_moved]( const std::vector<const item *> &fromset, item & toit ) -> void {
8627  books_moved = fromset.size();
8628  for( const item *ebook : fromset )
8629  {
8630  toit.put_in( *ebook, pocket_type::EBOOK );
8631  }
8632  };
8633 
8634  if( smenu.ret == 1 ) {
8635  // to device
8636  move_books( to_device, *it );
8637  } else if( smenu.ret == 2 ) {
8638  // from device
8639  move_books( to_storage, *storage_card );
8640  } else if( smenu.ret == 3 ) {
8641  game_menus::inv::ebookread( *p, storage_card );
8642  return std::nullopt;
8643  } else {
8644  return std::nullopt;
8645  }
8646 
8647  if( books_moved > 0 ) {
8648  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
8649  if( smenu.ret == 1 ) {
8650  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
8651  n_gettext( "Copied one book to the device.",
8652  "Copied %1$s books to the device.", books_moved ),
8653  books_moved );
8654  } else if( smenu.ret == 2 ) {
8655  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
8656  n_gettext( "Copied one book to the %2$s.",
8657  "Copied %1$s books to the %2$s.", books_moved ),
8658  books_moved, storage_card->tname() );
8659  }
8660  }
8661 
8662  return std::nullopt;
8663 }

bool has_pocket_type(pocket_type pk_type) const
Definition: item.cpp:9685

1951  }

1959  }
1960  }

1965  dest.y += ( dest.y - p->posy() );

1969 
1970  return 1;

3509 {
3510  // Two seconds of lit fuse burning
3511  // Followed by random number of explosions (4-6) per turn until 25 epxlosions have happened
3512  // Finally item despawns since countdown has ended
3513  if( it->age() < 2_seconds ) {
3514  sounds::sound( pos, 0, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "ssss…" ), true, "misc", "lit_fuse" );
3515  } else {
3516  // Time left to countdown_point is used to track of number of explosions
3517  int explosions = rng( 4, 6 );
3518  int i = 0;
3519  explosions = std::min( explosions, to_seconds<int>( it->countdown_point - calendar::turn ) );
3520  for( i = 0; i < explosions; i++ ) {
3521  sounds::sound( pos, 20, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "Bang!" ), false, "explosion", "small" );
3522  }
3523  it->countdown_point -= ( explosions - 1 ) * 1_seconds;
3524  }
3525  return 0;
3526 }

◆ fish_trap_tick()

std::optional< int > iuse::fish_trap_tick ( Character *  p,
item *  it,
const tripoint &  pos 
)
Survival randomly increases number of fish caught in fishing trap

Definition at line 1829 of file iuse.cpp.

1830 {
1831  map &here = get_map();
1832  // Handle processing fish trap over time.
1833  if( it->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
1834  it->active = false;
1835  return 0;
1836  }
1837  if( it->age() > 3_hours ) {
1838  it->active = false;
1839 
1840  if( !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FISHABLE, pos ) ) {
1841  return 0;
1842  }
1843 
1844  avatar &player = get_avatar();
1845 
1846  int success = -50;
1847  const float surv = player.get_skill_level( skill_survival );
1848  const int attempts = rng( it->ammo_remaining(), it->ammo_remaining() * it->ammo_remaining() );
1849  for( int i = 0; i < attempts; i++ ) {
1850  /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL randomly increases number of fish caught in fishing trap */
1851  success += rng( round( surv ), round( surv * surv ) );
1852  }
1853 
1854  int bait_consumed = rng( 0, it->ammo_remaining() + 1 );
1855  if( bait_consumed > it->ammo_remaining() ) {
1856  bait_consumed = it->ammo_remaining();
1857  }
1858 
1859  int fishes = 0;
1860 
1861  if( success < 0 ) {
1862  fishes = 0;
1863  } else if( success < 300 ) {
1864  fishes = 1;
1865  } else if( success < 1500 ) {
1866  fishes = 2;
1867  } else {
1868  fishes = rng( 3, 5 );
1869  }
1870 
1871  if( fishes == 0 ) {
1872  it->ammo_consume( it->ammo_remaining(), pos, nullptr );
1873  player.practice( skill_survival, rng( 5, 15 ) );
1874 
1875  return 0;
1876  }
1877 
1878  //get the fishables around the trap's spot
1879  std::unordered_set<tripoint> fishable_locations = g->get_fishable_locations( 60, pos );
1880  std::vector<monster *> fishables = g->get_fishable_monsters( fishable_locations );
1881  for( int i = 0; i < fishes; i++ ) {
1882  player.practice( skill_survival, rng( 3, 10 ) );
1883  if( !fishables.empty() ) {
1884  monster *chosen_fish = random_entry( fishables );
1885  // reduce the abstract fish_population marker of that fish
1886  chosen_fish->fish_population -= 1;
1887  if( chosen_fish->fish_population <= 0 ) {
1888  g->catch_a_monster( chosen_fish, pos, p, 300_hours ); //catch the fish!
1889  } else {
1890  here.add_item_or_charges( pos, item::make_corpse( chosen_fish->type->id,
1891  calendar::turn + rng( 0_turns,
1892  3_hours ) ) );
1893  }
1894  } else {
1895  //there will always be a chance that the player will get lucky and catch a fish
1896  //not existing in the fishables vector. (maybe it was in range, but wandered off)
1897  //lets say it is a 5% chance per fish to catch
1898  if( one_in( 20 ) ) {
1899  const std::vector<mtype_id> fish_group = MonsterGroupManager::GetMonstersFromGroup(
1900  GROUP_FISH, true );
1901  const mtype_id &fish_mon = random_entry_ref( fish_group );
1902  //Yes, we can put fishes in the trap like knives in the boot,
1903  //and then get fishes via activation of the item,
1904  //but it's not as comfortable as if you just put fishes in the same tile with the trap.
1905  //Also: corpses and comestibles do not rot in containers like this, but on the ground they will rot.
1906  //we don't know when it was caught so use a random turn
1907  here.add_item_or_charges( pos, item::make_corpse( fish_mon, it->birthday() + rng( 0_turns,
1908  3_hours ) ) );
1909  break; //this can happen only once
1910  }
1911  }
1912  }
1913  it->ammo_consume( bait_consumed, pos, nullptr );
1914  }
1915  return 0;
1916 }

666 {
667  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
668  return std::nullopt;
669  }
670 
671  const bool has_fungus = p->has_effect( effect_fungus );
672  const bool has_spores = p->has_effect( effect_spores );
673 
674  if( p->is_npc() && !has_fungus && !has_spores ) {
675  return std::nullopt;
676  }
677 
678  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You use your fungicide." ), _( "<npcname> uses some fungicide." ) );
679  if( has_fungus && one_in( 3 ) ) {
680  // this is not a medicine, the effect is shorter
681  p->add_effect( effect_antifungal, 1_hours );
682  if( p->has_effect( effect_fungus ) ) {
683  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
684  _( "You feel a burning sensation slowly radiating throughout your skin." ) );
685  }
686  }
687  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
688  if( has_spores && one_in( 2 ) ) {
689  if( !p->has_effect( effect_fungus ) ) {
690  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Your skin grows warm for a moment." ) );
691  }
692  p->remove_effect( effect_spores );
693  int spore_count = rng( 1, 6 );
694  map &here = get_map();
695  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( p->pos(), 1 ) ) {
696  if( spore_count == 0 ) {
697  break;
698  }
699  if( dest == p->pos() ) {
700  continue;
701  }
702  if( here.passable( dest ) && x_in_y( spore_count, 8 ) ) {
703  if( monster *const mon_ptr = creatures.creature_at<monster>( dest ) ) {
704  monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
705  if( !critter.type->in_species( species_FUNGUS ) ) {
706  add_msg_if_player_sees( dest, m_warning, _( "The %s is covered in tiny spores!" ),
707  critter.name() );
708  }
709  if( !critter.make_fungus() ) {
710  critter.die( p ); // counts as kill by player
711  }
712  } else {
713  g->place_critter_at( mon_spore, dest );
714  }
715  spore_count--;
716  }
717  }
718  }
719  return 1;
720 }

3973 {
3974  if( p && p->is_worn( *it ) ) {
3975  // calculate amount of absorbed gas per filter charge
3976  const field &gasfield = get_map().field_at( pos );
3977  for( const auto &dfield : gasfield ) {
3978  const field_entry &entry = dfield.second;
3979  int gas_abs_factor = to_turns<int>( entry.get_field_type()->gas_absorption_factor );

3981  if( gas_abs_factor == 0 ) {
3982  continue;
3983  }
3984  const field_intensity_level &int_level = entry.get_intensity_level();
3985  // 6000 is the amount of "gas absorbed" charges in a full 100 capacity gas mask cartridge.
3986  // factor/concentration gives an amount of seconds the cartidge is expected to last in current conditions.
3987  /// 6000/that is the amount of "gas absorbed" charges to tick up every second in order to reach that number.
3988  float gas_absorbed = 6000 / ( static_cast<float>( gas_abs_factor ) / static_cast<float>
3989  ( int_level.concentration ) );

3991  gas_abs_factor, int_level.concentration );

3995  }
3996  if( it->get_var( "gas_absorbed", 0 ) >= 60 ) {
3997  it->ammo_consume( 1, pos, p );
3998  it->set_var( "gas_absorbed", 0 );

4012  , it->tname() );
4013  }

4015

4017  it->set_var( "overwrite_env_resist", 0 );

4823  .description( prefix + " " + _( "(To delete, clear the text and confirm)" ) )
4824  .text( here.has_graffiti_at( where ) ? here.graffiti_at( where ) : std::string() )

4826  .query_string();

4828  return std::nullopt;

4830

4832  int move_cost;
4833  if( message.empty() ) {
4834  if( here.has_graffiti_at( where ) ) {
4835  move_cost = 3 * here.graffiti_at( where ).length();
4836  here.delete_graffiti( where );
4837  if( grave ) {
4838  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You blur the inscription on the grave." ) );
4839  } else {

4842  } else {
4843  return std::nullopt;
4844  }
4845  } else {
4846  here.set_graffiti( where, message );
4847  if( grave ) {
4848  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You carve an inscription on the grave." ) );
4849  } else {

4851  }
4852  move_cost = 2 * message.length();
4853  }

4855  if( it != nullptr ) {
4856  return 1;
4857  } else {
4858  return 0;
4859  }

2316  critter.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );

2318  if( one_in( 2 ) && critter.has_flag( mon_flag_SEES ) ) {
2319  blind = true;
2320  critter.add_effect( effect_blind, rng( 1_minutes, 2_minutes ) );
2321  }
2322  // even if it's not blinded getting maced hurts a lot and stuns it

2326  }

2329  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s is sprayed!" ), critter.name() );

2333  }
2334  }
2335 
2336  return 1;

2823  return 1;
2824  } else {

2826  return std::nullopt;
2827  }

◆ measure_resonance()

std::optional< int > iuse::measure_resonance ( Character *  p,
item *  it,
const tripoint &   
)

Definition at line 8471 of file iuse.cpp.

8472 {
8473  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
8474  popup( _( "The device doesn't have enough power to function!" ) );
8475  return std::nullopt;
8476  }
8477  // Get a list of resonant artifacts to show the player.
8478  std::vector<uilist_entry> uile;
8479  std::vector<item_location> artifacts;
8480  int i = 0;
8481  for( const item_location &item_loc : p->all_items_loc() ) {
8482  const item *tested_item = item_loc.get_item();
8483  if( !tested_item->get_proc_enchantments().empty() ) {
8484  // We've found an item with an enchantment. This doesn't guarantee it is an artifact! Prune the list to only items with resonance
8485  bool is_resonant_artifact = false;
8486  for( enchant_cache &maybe_artifact : tested_item->get_proc_enchantments() ) {
8487  if( maybe_artifact.get_value_add( enchant_vals::mod::ARTIFACT_RESONANCE ) ) {
8488  // Found an artifact with resonance!
8489  is_resonant_artifact = true;
8490  }
8491  }
8492  if( is_resonant_artifact ) {
8493  // Return tname, should handle renamed artifacts?
8494  uilist_entry entry( i, true, i + 49, item_loc.get_item()->tname() );
8495  uile.emplace_back( entry );
8496  artifacts.emplace_back( item_loc );
8497  i++;
8498  }
8499  }
8500  }
8501 
8502  if( artifacts.empty() ) {
8503  popup( _( "The device indicates none of the items on your person resonate with registered nether phenomena." ) );
8504  // Explicitly no cost for passive detection
8505  return std::nullopt;
8506  }
8507  int choice = 0;
8508  choice = uilist( _( "The device found these items have resonant properties.\nChoose one to scan." ),
8509  uile );
8510 
8511  if( choice < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( choice ) >= artifacts.size() ) {
8512  // Player exited menu. No cost, return early.
8513  return std::nullopt;
8514  }
8515 
8516  popup( _( "Calculating." ) );
8517  popup( _( "Calculating…" ) );
8518  int actual_resonance = 0;
8519  // Add up the resonance of all the enchantments on the selected item to get the item's total resonance
8520  for( enchant_cache &this_ench : artifacts.at( choice ).get_item()->get_proc_enchantments() ) {
8521  actual_resonance += this_ench.get_value_add( enchant_vals::mod::ARTIFACT_RESONANCE );
8522  }
8523  // Random 15% +- on the detection, no freebies here.
8524  int resonance_offset_low = 0.85 * actual_resonance;
8525  int resonance_offset_high = 1.15 * actual_resonance;
8526  int detected_resonance = rng( resonance_offset_low, resonance_offset_high );
8527  // Different messages for different resonance levels? Dangerous resonance levels are in suffer::from_artifact_resonance
8528  popup( _( "Detected resonance approximately equal to %i units." ), detected_resonance );
8529 
8530  p->consume_charges( *it, it->type->charges_to_use() );
8531  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_minutes ) );
8532 
8533 
8534  return 0;
8535 }

Definition at line 850 of file iuse.cpp.

851 {
852  /** @EFFECT_STR reduces duration of meth */
853  time_duration duration = 1_minutes * ( 60 - p->str_cur );
854  if( p->has_amount( itype_apparatus, 1 ) && p->use_charges_if_avail( itype_fire, 1 ) ) {
855  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You smoke your meth." ) );
856  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The world seems to sharpen." ) );
857  p->mod_sleepiness( -375 );
858  if( p->has_trait( trait_TOLERANCE ) ) {
859  duration *= 1.2;
860  } else {
861  duration *= ( p->has_trait( trait_LIGHTWEIGHT ) ? 1.8 : 1.5 );
862  }
863  map &here = get_map();
864  // breathe out some smoke
865  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
866  point offset( rng( -2, 2 ), rng( -2, 2 ) );
867  here.add_field( p->pos_bub() + offset, field_type_id( "fd_methsmoke" ), 2 );
868  }
869  } else {
870  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You snort some crystal meth." ) );
871  p->mod_sleepiness( -300 );
872  }
873  if( !p->has_effect( effect_meth ) ) {
874  duration += 1_hours;
875  }
876  if( duration > 0_turns ) {
877  // meth actually inhibits hunger, weaker characters benefit more
878  /** @EFFECT_STR_MAX >4 experiences less hunger benefit from meth */
879  int hungerpen = p->str_max < 5 ? 35 : 40 - ( 2 * p->str_max );
880  if( hungerpen > 0 ) {
881  p->mod_hunger( -hungerpen );
882  }
883  p->add_effect( effect_meth, duration );
884  }
885  return 1;
886 }

3822  } else if( it->typeId() == itype_smartphone_music ) {
3823  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The phone turns off." ) );
3824  it->convert( itype_smart_phone, p ).active = false;
3825  } else if( it->typeId() == itype_afs_atomic_smartphone_music ) {
3826  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The phone turns off." ) );
3827  it->convert( itype_afs_atomic_smartphone, p ).active = false;
3828  } else if( it->typeId() == itype_afs_atomic_wraitheon_music ) {
3829  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The phone turns off." ) );
3830  it->convert( itype_afs_wraitheon_smartphone, p ).active = false;
3831  }
3832  p->mod_moves( -200 );
3833  music::deactivate_music_id( music::music_id::mp3 );
3834 
3835  return 0;
3836

7487  menu.addentry( mc_upgrade, true, 'u', _( "Upgrade multi-cooker" ) );
7488  } else {
7489  if( upgr == "UPGRADE" ) {
7490  menu.addentry( mc_upgrade, false, 'u', _( "Multi-cooker already upgraded" ) );
7491  } else {

7493  }
7494  }

7560  return std::nullopt;
7561  }

7571  // json, because multicook must be used only by activating, not as

7597

7599  return std::nullopt;

7719 {
7720  const int charge_buffer = 2;
7721 
7722  //stop action before power runs out and iuse deletes the cooker
7723  if( it->ammo_remaining( p, true ) < charge_buffer ) {
7724  it->active = false;
7725  it->erase_var( "RECIPE" );
7726  it->convert( itype_multi_cooker, p );
7727  //drain the buffer amount given at activation
7728  it->ammo_consume( charge_buffer, pos, p );
7729  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
7730  _( "Batteries low, entering standby mode. With a low buzzing sound the multi-cooker shuts down." ) );
7731  return 0;
7732  }

7735  cooktime -= 100;
7736 
7737  if( cooktime >= 300 && cooktime < 400 ) {
7738  //Smart or good cook or careful
7739  /** @EFFECT_INT increases chance of checking multi-cooker on time */
7740 
7741  /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases chance of checking multi-cooker on time */
7742  avatar &player = get_avatar();
7743  if( player.int_cur + player.get_skill_level( skill_cooking ) + player.get_skill_level(
7744  skill_survival ) > 16 ) {
7745  add_msg( m_info, _( "The multi-cooker should be finishing shortly…" ) );
7746  }
7747  }
7748

7752  meal.heat_up();
7753  } else {

7755  get_weather().get_temperature( pos ) ) );
7756  }

7763  } else {

7765  _( "Obstruction detected. Please remove any items lodged in the multi-cooker." ) );
7766  return 0;

7771 
7772  return 0;
7773  } else {
7774  it->set_var( "COOKTIME", cooktime );
7775  return 0;
7776  }
7777 
7778  return 0;

1623  mon->friendly = -1;
1624  mon->add_effect( effect_pet, 1_turns, true );
1625  if( halluc ) {
1626  item drop_me = p->reduce_charges( it, 1 );
1627  p->i_drop_at( drop_me );
1628  } else {
1629  p->consume_charges( *it, 1 );
1630  }
1631  return std::nullopt;
1632  }
1633  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There is nothing to be fed here." ) );
1634  return std::nullopt;
1635 }

4041  } else {

4046  n.can_hear( p->pos(), p->get_shout_volume() ) &&

4072  case 2:
4073  loaded_software = "snake_game";

4087  break;
4088  case 7: {
4089  if( friends_w_game.empty() ) {
4090  return std::nullopt;
4091  }
4092  loaded_software = "null";
4093  }
4094  break;
4095  default:
4096  //Cancel
4097  return std::nullopt;
4098  }
4099 
4100  //Play in 15-minute chunks
4101  const int moves = to_moves<int>( 15_minutes );
4102  size_t num_friends = w_friends ? friends_w_game.size() : 0;
4103  int winner = rng( 0, num_friends );
4104  if( winner == 0 ) {
4105  winner = get_player_character().getID().get_value();
4106  } else {
4107  winner = friends_w_game[winner - 1]->getID().get_value();
4108  }
4109  player_activity game_act( ACT_GENERIC_GAME, to_moves<int>( 1_hours ), num_friends,
4110  p->get_item_position( it ), w_friends ? "gaming with friends" : "gaming" );
4111  game_act.values.emplace_back( winner );
4112

4114  std::string it_name = it->type_name( num_friends + 1 );

4116  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You and your %1$u friends play on your %2$s for a while." ), num_friends,
4117  it_name );
4118  } else {

4120  }
4121  for( npc *n : friends_w_game ) {
4122  std::vector<item *> nit = n->cache_get_items_with( it->typeId(), []( const item & i ) {
4123  return i.ammo_sufficient( nullptr );
4124  } );
4125  n->assign_activity( game_act );
4126  n->activity.targets.emplace_back( *n, nit.front() );
4127  n->activity.position = n->get_item_position( nit.front() );
4128  }
4129  } else {
4130  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You play on your %s for a while." ), it->tname() );
4131  }
4132  if( loaded_software == "null" ) {
4133  p->assign_activity( game_act );
4134  p->activity.targets.emplace_back( *p, it );
4135  return 0;
4136  }
4137  p->assign_activity( ACT_GAME, moves, -1, 0, "gaming" );
4138  p->activity.targets.emplace_back( *p, it );

4140  game_data.clear();
4141  int game_score = 0;

4144

4146  p->add_msg_if_player( game_data["end_message"] );
4147  }
4148

4152  if( moraletype == "MORALE_GAME_FOUND_KITTEN" ) {
4153  p->add_morale( MORALE_GAME_FOUND_KITTEN, game_score, 110 );

2595  return SNIPPET.random_from_category( "radio_station_desc_noise_80" )->translated();

2627  }

2531  const radio_tower_reference tref = overmap_buffer.find_radio_station( it->frequency );
2532  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_RADIO, "Set freq: %d", it->frequency );
2533  if( tref ) {
2534  point_abs_omt dbgpos = project_to<coords::omt>( tref.abs_sm_pos );
2535  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_RADIO, "found broadcast (str %d) at (%d %d)",
2536  tref.signal_strength, dbgpos.x(), dbgpos.y() );
2537  const radio_tower *selected_tower = tref.tower;
2538  if( selected_tower->type == radio_type::MESSAGE_BROADCAST ) {
2539  message = selected_tower->message;
2540  } else if( selected_tower->type == radio_type::WEATHER_RADIO ) {
2541  message = weather_forecast( tref.abs_sm_pos );
2542  }

2546  const std::string cityname = c == nullptr ? _( "ksssh" ) : c->name;
2547

2549  int static_chance = radio_static_chance( tref );

2551  message = obscure_message( message, [&static_chance]()->int {
2552  if( x_in_y( static_chance, 100 ) )
2553  {
2554  // Gradually replace random characters with noise as distance increases
2555  if( one_in( 3 ) && static_chance - rng( 0, 25 ) < 50 ) {
2556  // Replace with random character
2557  return 0;
2558  }
2559  // Replace with '#'
2560  return '#';
2561  }
2562  // Leave unchanged
2563  return -1;
2564  } );
2565

2567  int index = to_turn<int>( calendar::turn ) % segments.size();
2568  message = string_format( _( "radio: %s" ), segments[index] );
2569  }
2570  sounds::ambient_sound( pos, 6, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech, message );
2571  if( !sfx::is_channel_playing( sfx::channel::radio ) ) {
2572  if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
2573  sfx::play_ambient_variant_sound( "radio", "static", 100, sfx::channel::radio, 300, -1, 0 );

2575  sfx::play_ambient_variant_sound( "radio", "inaudible_chatter", 100, sfx::channel::radio, 300, -1,
2576  0 );
2577  }
2578  }
2579  return 1;
2580 }

5376  seen_loc = candidate.pos();
5377  } else {
5378  seen_loc = p->pos();
5379  }

5381  }
5382  }
5383  if( mons.empty() ) {
5384  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "No enemy robots in range." ) );
5385  return 1;
5386  }
5387  pointmenu_cb callback( locations );
5388  pick_robot.callback = &callback;
5389  pick_robot.query();

5391  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind" ) );
5392  return 1;
5393  }

5395  shared_ptr_fast< monster > z = mons[mondex];
5396  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You start reprogramming the %s into an ally." ), z->name() );
5397 
5398  /** @EFFECT_INT speeds up hacking preparation */
5399  /** @EFFECT_COMPUTER speeds up hacking preparation */

5401  1000 - static_cast<int>( p->int_cur * 10 - p->get_skill_level( skill_computer ) * 10 ) );
5402  player_activity act( ACT_ROBOT_CONTROL, move_cost );
5403  act.monsters.emplace_back( z );
5404

5406

5408  }
5409  case 1: { //make all friendly robots stop their purposeless extermination of (un)life.
5410  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
5411  int f = 0; //flag to check if you have robotic allies
5412  for( monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
5413  if( critter.friendly != 0 && critter.type->in_species( species_ROBOT ) ) {
5414  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "A following %s goes into passive mode." ),
5415  critter.name() );
5416  critter.add_effect( effect_docile, 1_turns, true );
5417  f = 1;
5418  }
5419  }
5420  if( f == 0 ) {
5421  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You aren't commanding any robots." ) );
5422  return std::nullopt;
5423  }
5424  return 1;
5425  }
5426  case 2: { //make all friendly robots terminate (un)life with extreme prejudice
5427  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
5428  int f = 0; //flag to check if you have robotic allies
5429  for( monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
5430  if( critter.friendly != 0 && critter.has_flag( mon_flag_ELECTRONIC ) ) {
5431  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "A following %s goes into combat mode." ),
5432  critter.name() );
5433  critter.remove_effect( effect_docile );
5434  f = 1;
5435  }
5436  }
5437  if( f == 0 ) {
5438  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You aren't commanding any robots." ) );
5439  return std::nullopt;
5440  }
5441  return 1;
5442  }
5443  }
5444  return 0;
5445 }

2916  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
2917  return std::nullopt;
2918  }
2919  map &here = get_map();
2920  const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f = [&here]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
2921  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( pnt );
2922  return !!vp;
2923  };
2924 
2925  vehicle *v = nullptr;
2926  bool found_more_than_one = false;
2927  for( const tripoint &pos : here.points_in_radius( p->pos(), 1 ) ) {
2928  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( pos );
2929  if( !vp ) {
2930  continue;
2931  }
2932  vehicle *vfound = &vp->vehicle();
2933  if( v == nullptr ) {
2934  v = vfound;
2935  } else {
2936  //found more than one vehicle?
2937  if( v != vfound ) {
2938  v = nullptr;
2939  found_more_than_one = true;
2940  break;
2941  }
2942  }
2943  }
2944  if( found_more_than_one ) {
2945  std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight(
2946  _( "Siphon from where?" ), _( "There is nothing to siphon from nearby." ), f, false );
2947  if( !pnt_ ) {
2948  return std::nullopt;
2949  }
2950  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( *pnt_ );
2951  if( vp ) {
2952  v = &vp->vehicle();
2953  }
2954  }
2955 
2956  if( v == nullptr ) {
2957  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's no vehicle there." ) );
2958  return std::nullopt;
2959  }
2960  act_vehicle_siphon( v );
2961  return 1;
2962 }

5082  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The stimulant delivery system is empty." ) );
5083  return std::nullopt;
5084  } else {
5085  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You inject yourself with the stimulants." ) );
5086  // Intensity is 2 here because intensity = 1 is the comedown
5087  p->add_effect( effect_stimpack, 25_minutes, false, 2 );
5088  p->mod_painkiller( 2 );
5089  p->mod_stim( 20 );
5090  p->mod_sleepiness( -100 );
5091  p->set_stamina( p->get_stamina_max() );
5092  }
5093  return 1;
5094 }

3622  // Stun duration scales harshly inversely with big creatures
3623  if( target->get_size() == creature_size::tiny ) {
3624  target->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * rng_float( 1.5, 2.5 ) );
3625  } else if( target->get_size() == creature_size::small ) {
3626  target->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * rng_float( 1.25, 2.0 ) );
3627  } else if( target->get_size() == creature_size::large ) {
3628  target->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * rng_float( 0.95, 1.15 ) );
3629  } else if( target->get_size() == creature_size::huge ) {
3630  target->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * rng_float( 0.5, 0.8 ) );
3631  } else {
3632  target->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * rng_float( 1.1, 1.5 ) );

5232 {
5233  if( !it || !it->is_toolmod() ) {
5234  debugmsg( "tried to attach non-toolmod" );
5235  return std::nullopt;
5236  }
5237 
5238  if( !p ) {
5239  return std::nullopt;
5240  }
5241 
5242  auto filter = [&it]( const item & e ) {
5243  // don't allow ups or bionic battery mods on a UPS or UPS-powered/bionic-powered tools
5244  if( ( it->has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) || it->has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) &&
5245  ( e.has_flag( flag_IS_UPS ) || e.has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ||
5246  e.has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) ) {
5247  return false;
5248  }
5249 
5250  // can't mod non-tool, or a tool with existing mods, or a battery currently installed
5251  if( !e.is_tool() || !e.toolmods().empty() || e.magazine_current() ) {
5252  return false;
5253  }
5254 
5255  // can only attach to unmodified tools that use compatible ammo
5256  return std::any_of( it->type->mod->acceptable_ammo.begin(),
5257  it->type->mod->acceptable_ammo.end(), [&]( const ammotype & at ) {
5258  return e.type->tool->ammo_id.count( at );
5259  } );
5260  };
5261 
5262  item_location loc = g->inv_map_splice( filter, _( "Select tool to modify:" ), 1,
5263  _( "You don't have compatible tools." ) );
5264 
5265  if( !loc ) {
5266  add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
5267  return std::nullopt;
5268  }
5269 
5270  if( loc->ammo_remaining() ) {
5271  if( !p->unload( loc ) ) {
5272  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cancel unloading the tool." ) );
5273  return std::nullopt;
5274  }
5275  }
5276 
5277  p->toolmod_add( std::move( loc ), item_location( *p, it ) );
5278  return 0;
5279 }

4998  it->convert( itype_towel_wet, p );
4999  }

5003  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You are already dry; the %s does nothing." ), name );

5010  }

5012  if( it ) {
5013  // WET, active items have their timer decremented every turn

5016  }

8162  };

8172  return location->has_flag( flag_FILTHY ) && !location->has_flag( flag_NO_CLEAN ) &&
8173  ( ( soft_items && location->is_soft() ) || ( hard_items && !location->is_soft() ) );

8212  }
8213  const drop_locations to_clean = inv_s.execute();
8214  if( to_clean.empty() ) {

8216  }

8219  for( drop_location pair : to_clean ) {
8220  if( !pair.first ) {
8221  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
8222  return std::nullopt;
8223  }

8225  }
8226

7802  temperature_str );

7805  if( it->typeId() == itype_hygrometer ) {
7806  p->add_msg_if_player(
7807  m_neutral, _( "The %1$s reads %2$s." ), it->tname(),
7808  print_humidity( get_local_humidity( weatherPoint.humidity, get_weather().weather_id,
7809  g->is_sheltered( p->pos() ) ) ) );
7810  } else {
7811  p->add_msg_if_player(
7812  m_neutral, _( "Relative Humidity: %s." ),
7813  print_humidity( get_local_humidity( weatherPoint.humidity, get_weather().weather_id,
7814  g->is_sheltered( p->pos() ) ) ) );
7815  }
7816  }
7817  if( it->has_flag( flag_BAROMETER ) ) {
7818  if( it->typeId() == itype_barometer ) {
7819  p->add_msg_if_player(
7820  m_neutral, _( "The %1$s reads %2$s." ), it->tname(),
7821  print_pressure( static_cast<int>( weatherPoint.pressure ) ) );
7822  } else {
7823  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "Pressure: %s." ),
7824  print_pressure( static_cast<int>( weatherPoint.pressure ) ) );
7825  }
7826  }
7827 
7828  if( it->typeId() == itype_weather_reader ) {
7829  int vehwindspeed = 0;
7830  if( optional_vpart_position vp = get_map().veh_at( p->pos() ) ) {
7831  vehwindspeed = std::abs( vp->vehicle().velocity / 100 ); // For mph
7832  }
7833  const oter_id &cur_om_ter = overmap_buffer.ter( p->global_omt_location() );
7834  const int windpower = get_local_windpower( weather.windspeed + vehwindspeed, cur_om_ter,
7835  p->get_location(), weather.winddirection, g->is_sheltered( p->pos() ) );
7836

7838  convert_velocity( windpower * 100, VU_WIND ),
7839  velocity_units( VU_WIND ) );

7841  m_neutral, _( "Feels Like: %s." ),
7842  print_temperature( player_local_temp + get_local_windchill( weatherPoint.temperature,
7843  weatherPoint.humidity, windpower ) ) );
7844  std::string dirstring = get_dirstring( weather.winddirection );
7845  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "Wind Direction: From the %s." ), dirstring );
7846  }
